title: Next year needs to add W.U.R.F.
body:
Gold gains doubled
Item slots doubled
Trinket and Ward Limit doubled 
Item prices halved 
Stat caps removed except for CDR and AS
CDR, Crit Chance and AS bonuses are halved 
Base stats halved except for crit damage
Bonuses from Runes and Masteries removed
Unique Passives and Actives are no longer unique

Tryndamere can ult through any CC, but it has a .75 second delay before it takes effect.
